welcome_message_body: Welcome to Olanchito, Honduras! This charming city is known for its vibrant culture, beautiful scenery, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Olanchito has to offer.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Goloson International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Goloson International Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.
